LanguageData.MSMercurySalts.label: Mercury Salts
LanguageData.MSMercurySalts.description: A vermillion powdery salt otherwise known as cinnibar which contains mercury. A precursor chemical. (Made from stone chunks).
LanguageData.MSEthylMercury.label: Ethyl Mercury
LanguageData.MSEthylMercury.description: Ethyl mercury is a cation composed of an organic CH3CH2- species (an ethyl group) bound to a mercury(II) centre, making it a type of organometallic cation, and giving it a chemical formula is C2H5Hg+. A precursor chemical. (Made from Chemfuel and Mercury Salts).
